reviews.review: Интересно играть, тренируется реакция и понимание, общение с норм людьми и даунами
bockt sich auf jeden fall wenn man prime hat (13 euro oder rank 21)

Como todo jogo, é mais divertido multiplayer, brincar com os amigos ou querer jogar um competitivo.

Я думаю,что тупо,но я хочу написать про кс в 2019.Вообщем,игра хорошая,веселая,но мне обидно,что ее сделали фактически бесплатной.Единственный минус в том,что каждый 3 ребенок будет неадекватным. Нет,конечно есть множество хороших людей,но все-таки хотелось бы систему тимкиллов из радуги и голосование за мут.

wow a game that can make you feel many different feelings: from rage to happiness, a game that could change your life from worse to best or other way around, a game that i sometimes call russian simulator, i have 1999 hrs at the time of this review and i must say the game has gotten worse from when i started on this account in 2017, many changes and stuff happened but im stilll here couple years later playing it every single day and im kinda enjoying it still, its not what it used to be but times change so does the game, and not to mention many hackers around, but still one of the best fps ever.

edit:2700 hrs edit game is pure shit don't bother cheaters nest and a random free fps game on steam has better hitbox or as i call it shitbox, you can onetap your ass off and still give the opponent 1 in 1 great game just care for skins and money, nothing else matters...

your good, you'll have fun, your shit, you'll hate your life.
